channel.title: Ricing and Theming on nuaNce's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Ricing and Theming on nuaNce's blog

item.title: A Few of My Favorite Monospaced Fonts
item.description: I’ve always had a bit of an exaggerated font collection, most likely because I could never really decide on a single one. I do, however, have quite a few that I like more than others, here are some of them: Bergen Mono Roboto Mono Input Mono Apercu PT Mono Operator Mono Alma Mono JetBrains Mono Space Mono Overpass Mono Liberation Mono Bront IBM Plex Mono DM Mono DejaVu Sans Mono Source Code Pro

item.title: My Linux Rices
item.description: Morning Coffee. Safe and Sound. Bloated Minimalism. Misty Mountain. Function > Form. Contempt. One With The Mountain. Is One Rose Enough? IceBerg. Attention to Detail. Bliss v1.5 Polka. GMK Dots. :bleedingeyes: Don’t Ask. Colors of Seoul Mediocre. A Night in Paris. Pop of Red. Bliss. Sans of Time. Clarity. Windows 98 Gloomy Nights. Warm and Sweet. Serenity.
